cards.rules_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, one of them on top of your library, and one of them into your graveyard.
Exile target creature. At the beginning of that creature's controller's next end step, put that creature card on top of its owner's library.
You get an emblem with “At the beginning of each end step, if it's not your turn, take an extra turn after this one.”
cards.special_text:
[+2]: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, one of them on top of your library, and one of them into your graveyard.
[-2]: Exile target creature. At the beginning of that creature's controller's next end step, put that creature card on top of its owner's library.
[-11]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of each end step, if it's not your turn, take an extra turn after this one.”

cards.rules_text:
Cast Coyopa, God of Life only if your ancestry in white is five or greater. [i](Each white card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in white.)[/i]
When Coyopa, God of Life dies, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, you get an emblem with “{4}{W}{W}: Return target permanent from your graveyard to the battlefield.”
Lifelink

Cast Cuetzal, God of the Skies only if your ancestry in blue is five or greater. [i](Each blue card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in blue.)[/i]
When Cuetzal, God of the Skies dies, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, you get an emblem with “{1}{U}{U}: Creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.”
Flying

Cast Ix, God of the Afterlife only if your ancestry in black is five or greater. [i](Each black card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in black.)[/i]
When Ix, God of the Afterlife dies, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, you get an emblem with “{4}{B}{B}: Each opponent sacrifices a creature.”
Deathtouch

Cast Cabracan, God of Chaos only if your ancestry in red is five or greater. [i](Each red card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in red.)[/i]
When Cabracan, God of Chaos dies, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, you get an emblem with “{R}{R}: Creatures target opponent controls can't block this turn.”
Haste

Cast Akna, God of the Wild only if your ancestry in green is five or greater. [i](Each green card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in green.)[/i]
When Akna, God of the Wild dies, you may exile it from your graveyard. If you do, you get an emblem with “{2}{G}{G}: Put a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.”
Trample

Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, if Living Legend is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{W}{W}. If you do, return Living Legend from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

Cannibalize {3}{B}{B} [i]({3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on this creature. Cannibalize only as a sorcery.)[/i]
[i]Bloodrite[/i] — Whenever you sacrifice a creature, you may pay 5 life. If you do, put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

Flying
Whenever Ehnit, the Slavedriver attacks, defending player reveals the top card of his or her library. If a creature card is revealed in this way, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control tapped and attacking. If you do, exile it at end of turn.

If Monta, the Troll Father would be countered, return it to your hand instead.
Whenever Monta, the Troll Father would be destroyed, if your ancestry in green is five or greater, regenerate it. [i](Each green card in your graveyard counts towards your ancestry in green.)[/i] [i](The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)[/i]

Each player exiles a permanent he or she controls.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
Exile all permanents, then put up to three other exiled permanents onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.special_text:
[+3]: Each player exiles a permanent he or she controls.
[-3]: Exile target creature or planeswalker.
[-16]: Exile all permanents, then put up to three other exiled permanents onto the battlefield under your control.

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Ay'I, Temple Magister attacks, name three cards, then search your library for a card with one of those names and exile it face down. Your opponent chooses one of those three names. If the exiled card has a different name than the chosen name, you may cast it this turn without paying its mana cost.

Add {R}{G} to your mana pool. Use this mana only to cast creature spells.
Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
Sacrifice all creatures you control. For each creature sacrificed in this way, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste onto the battlefield.
cards.special_text:
[+1]: Add {R}{G} to your mana pool. Use this mana only to cast creature spells. 
[-2]: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
[-6]: Sacrifice all creatures you control. For each creature sacrificed in this way, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste onto the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
{2}{W}: Underworld Chimera gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. [i](This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that color until end of turn.)[/i]
{2}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking Underworld Chimera.
{1}{W}{B}: Underworld Chimera gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The chimera embodies the holy trinity of life, death, and the passage between.[/i]

{1}{G}: Return Ilin, Who Walks with Beasts to its owner's hand.
Whenever Ilin, Who Walks with Beasts attacks, you may pay {3}{G}{G}. If you do, exile it, then put a legendary 6/6 green Spirit Beast creature token named Ilin's Breath onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. At end of combat, return Ilin to the battlefield tapped, then exile that token.
For each basic land you control, search your library for a land card that shares a type with it and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Each tree's journey begins long before we are born and ends long after we die. That's the magic of nature.”
— Ilin[/i]

cards.rules_text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

As an additional cost to cast Heart, sacrifice a creature.
You gain life and draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.
cards.rules_text2:
As an additional cost to cast Soul, sacrifice a creature.
Put X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.

cards.rules_text: {1}: Target opponent names a card, then you reveal your hand. If you revealed one or more cards and didn't reveal the named card, you draw a card, then Monument of Ay'I becomes a 4/4 Sphinx creature with flying and indestructible until end of turn.
Remove all counters from among creatures and artifacts. For each counter removed in this way, put a 1/1 Horror artifact creature token onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Karn stood motionless, suddenly stricken with fear, as his unseen corruption spread.[/i]

{X}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power X or less for as long as Ehnit's Slave Chains remains tapped. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

• Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
